alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 1:30PM MDT until March 30 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches possible. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills. This includes communities such as Evergreen, Aspen Park, Pine Grove, Buffalo Creek, and Perry Park. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Wednesday. Heaviest snow between 8 PM and 3 AM. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Use caution when traveling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
